ygData.subject: Re: EK at 16 (was:RE: [eqbards] JM Capozi)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My major problem with Lake of Ill Manners is distance from bind point.  It s so far to run to a zone, or if I die, from the zone to where I died, I d be
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:26 PM 11/7/2001 -0500, you wrote:
>I was going solo at that level in EK. I was doing the hymn-cod-bellow
>twist. At the time I was in bronze and banded, far from what level 16
>equipment is these days. So more times then not I would have to stop that
>twist and kite them with selo and bellow.
>
>If I had it to do over again these days (now that there is Kunark and
>Velious) I would probably go to Lake of Ill Omen.

My major problem with Lake of Ill Manners is distance from bind
point. It's so far to run to a zone, or if I die, from the zone to where I
died, I'd be really bad off....

Talies
